name: konnectors
description: Store data from the web in your Cozy

Steps.description: Import step and travelled distance data from jawbone.com or withings.

PhoneBill.description: Phone bills fetched by Bouygues Telecom Konnector.

InternetBill.description: Internet bills fetched by Free Konnector.

CodeBill.description: Code bills fetched by Github Konnector.

File.description: To import CSV or PDF file in the Cozy File System.

Folder.description: To allow user to select folder for his/her fetched files.

Weight.description: Import weight infos from Smart Body Analyzer.

HeartBeat.description: Import heartbeat from Smart Body Analyzer.

BloodPressure.description: Import blood pressure measures from Smart Body Analyzer.

CozyInstance.description: This information is needed to localize the application in your language.
